lexUnit.name: fang.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a dangerous tooth, large and sharp and/or capable of delivering poison

sentence.text: Sometimes these similarities are quite obvious : the ferocious teeth of a predatory dinosaur are a sure indication of hunting habits , with hardly a glance at the fangs of living mammalian carnivores .
The spider has fangs on the ends of its jaws and with these it paralyses the prey by injecting it with poisons .
A rattlesnake 's fangs are neatly folded away when not in use but are swung forward for the strike .
The three killer dogs burst from the trees in hot pursuit , their gleaming white fangs bared for the attack .
They growl and show their fangs .

Straining his ears over the slight sounds of their careful progress for any alien noises in the night , Grant found his thoughts increasingly filled with unsettling images of leaping dark shapes and gleaming fangs .
The Giant or Great Wolf of the Warhammer World is a fearsome monster with slavering fangs and huge claws .
The moment it is within range it strikes with sudden speed , burying its fangs in the soft neck tissues of its prey .
This means that when the jaws gape fully open , the sharp fangs are aimed directly forward .
When an active fang is ripped out , the next most mature one takes its place and quickly develops so that it is ready to fire .
The fangs are hollow and are linked to a venom gland .
I AM walking over hot coals , supended over a deep pit at the bottom of which are a large number of vipers baring their fangs .
Some caught in the rigging and thudded to the deck , spitting and baring their fangs at us before being hurriedly kicked overboard .
However , when fighting against another rattlesnake it does not use its poison fangs .
It is significant that the two largest warts are positioned on either side of the top of its thick neck -- precisely the place where a cat likes to sink its fangs when making its killing bite .
Only the really savage hunter , who sinks his fangs deep into the toad 's neck at its very first contact , will suffer a major trauma or death .
It kills its victims with venomous fangs .
